Binance, Changpeng 'CZ' Zhao to Pay $2.85B Fine in CFTC Settlement https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/11/21/binance-changpeng-cz-zhao-to-pay-285b-fine-in-cftc-settlement/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines PMCAQK2AJZGONHZHTXYYRSLDWE Nikhilesh DeCrypto exchange Binance and its founder, Changpeng "CZ" Zhao will pay nearly $3 billion in fines to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to settling the regulator's lawsuit against it. The company is also settling with the U.S. Department of Justice and Treasury Department in parallel actions on Tuesday.
